procedural_fairness: Judicial review analyzed whether the immigration officer applied the correct legal test for 'common-law partner'.

Different Crime.Crime Name: Failure to disclose common-law partner status
procedural_fairness: immigration officer failed to assess relationship
decision_reasoning: relationship not properly evaluated against 'common-law partner' definition

procedure_followed: judicial review application filed, Federal Court reviewed decision
result_of_case: case returned for reconsideration by a different immigration officer
